attention1.ptxt: Refer to Air Bag Warning before starting service work.

attention2.ptxt: Position heat control mode into FOOT MODE before removing instrument panel to avoid the damage to air flow control door.

s1.ptxt: Remove driver side instrument panel under cover (1) and passenger side instrument panel under cover (2).
Disable air bag system referring to Disabling Air Bag System .
Turn steering wheel to remove steering column cover screws (3).
Remove console box referring to Console Box Components .
Remove front pillar trims (1) front side sill scuffs (2) and dash side trims (3).
Disconnect instrument panel harness connectors, inside air temperature sensor duct and antenna cable instrument panel removal.
Remove steering column mounting referring to Steering Column Assembly Removal and Installation .
Remove instrument panel (2) with steering support member and instrument panel harness.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: When installing each part, be careful not to catch any cable or wiring harness.
Tighten instrument panel mounting bolts to specified torque
Tighten steering column mounting nuts referring to Steering Column Assembly Removal and Installation .
Enable air bag system referring to Enabling Air Bag System .
